snippet.title: EchoBlade - Gameplay Trailer 2022
snippet.description:
ADD TO YOUR STEAM WISHLIST TODAY!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1422570/EchoBlade/

Venture forth in this puzzle-combat dungeon explorer. Blinded and trapped inside a dungeon tower, use echolocation to uncover your path to freedom. Danger lurks around every corner: trapdoors, chambers filled with toxic fumes, and halls patrolled by crusader knights are only the beginning.

Check out Sunset Arctic Games on Twitter: https://twitter.com/sunsetarctic
